title: Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site: Air Quality
body: Air Quality       Located at the summit unit of Allegheny Portage Railroad NHS is an air monitoring station which collects rain and snowfall to measure acidic and mercury air pollutants. Precipitation is collected weekly and analyzed by the PA Atmospheric Deposition Monitoring Network and the National Atmospheric Deposition Program's Mercury Deposition Network. Results are published in annual reports.
